title.rendered: Working as a Freelancer provides me 3 gifts: Freedom, Space and Earning Good Enough.

content.rendered:
Meet Neha Sharma, a Digital Marketing Certified, a Proud Digiperformer. After 5 years of experience and working with big companies in metro cities, she was looking for an option where she could just lay and sit back with her family and work simultaneously. During the time, one word was just stuck in her mind i.e. Freelancer. She was excited to be a freelancer and was looking for a digital marketing course in Guwahati, in her home town. And, guess what? She got it. She enrolled in our Guwahati center, got certified and now working as a freelancer with top-notch companies, that too from her sweet home. Yes, she is! For a chit chat, we decided to meet her in person, ask what motivated her to learn digital marketing and join Digiperform. Have a look!

Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Neha: Hi, I’m Neha Sharma from Guwahati. Professionally speaking, I have more than 5 years of experience. I have worked in major metro cities like Bangalore, Delhi/NCR, etc. And, now, I’m back to my sweet hometown, Guwahati. And, you must be thinking about what I have been doing here. Well, I’m a proud digital marketer and currently working as a full-time freelancer with many companies. Sounds exciting, right! 😀

Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Neha: There are many reasons that I decided to be part of the digital marketing industry. First, it’s a huge industry that has immense platforms to work with. You don’t need to be restricted to one profile only. Second, personally, I feel, it is the only industry which can allow you to earn money as a freelancer, just sitting at home. I was tired of working away from home. I wanted to give some time to my family and be with them. Therefore, I decided to pursue my career as a freelancer and start learning digital marketing for the same.

Digiperform: What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Neha: I was looking for the best institute in digital marketing, near my home. And, Guess what, I found Digiperform. I was surprised that such a big brand was just nearby my home and providing training to Guwahatiians.   I got Digital Marketing Certified from Digiperform and now working as a freelancer. As if now, I have taken many projects in my hand and serving my clients as a full-time resource from my home itself.

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Neha: I liked the training session of Digiperform. The trainers are very helpful here.

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Neha: As I said, trainers of Digiperform are good who are always ready to explain and clear doubts anytime. Also, they are quite friendly and easy to talk with. While taking freelancing projects, they helped me to understand the requirement even after the completion of the course. Whenever I needed help, they helped me. 😀

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Neha: I would rate Digiperform 8 out of 10.

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Neha: If everything will go as per my plan, I would like to be the owner of a Digital Marketing Agency. That’s a dream I’m having…( she chuckles with excitement)

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Neha: Don’t stop yourself in trying new things.

Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Neha: Digiperform is one of the best institutes in Guwahati. I love Digiperform. 😀 Digiperform: Thanks, Neha for sharing such valuable information with us. We wish you great luck with your future endeavors.
